entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:59 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -37.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -37.5°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -41.0°C
Wind: WSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
